name: autonomous-dev
description: PROJECT.md-first autonomous development system with knowledge base. 8-agent pipeline validates alignment, auto-bootstraps starter knowledge (Claude Code 2.0 best practices), includes search utilities for 90% faster repeat research. Automatic formatting, testing, security scanning, and documentation. Works for Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, and Go projects.
longDescription:
Transform your development workflow with autonomous agents that handle the tedious work automatically.

**What it does:**
- Validates every feature against PROJECT.md goals
- Auto-bootstraps knowledge base with Claude Code 2.0 best practices
- Caches research findings (90% faster on repeat topics)
- Auto-formats code (black, prettier) on every save
- Auto-runs tests when you change code
- Auto-scans for security vulnerabilities
- Auto-updates documentation
- Auto-creates GitHub Issues from test failures

**8 Specialized Agents:**
- orchestrator: Coordinates the entire pipeline
- planner: Designs architecture (uses Opus for complex planning)
- researcher: Finds patterns, caches findings, reuses knowledge
- test-master: TDD specialist (writes tests first!)
- implementer: Writes production code
- reviewer: Quality gate (checks patterns, tests, docs)
- security-auditor: Security scanning (uses Haiku for cost efficiency)
- doc-master: Documentation sync (uses Haiku)

**33 Discoverable Commands:**
- Testing (7): /test, /test-unit, /test-integration, /test-uat, /test-uat-genai, /test-architecture, /test-complete
- Commit (4): /commit, /commit-check, /commit-push, /commit-release
- Alignment (5): /align-project, /align-project-fix, /align-project-safe, /align-project-sync, /align-project-dry-run
- Issues (5): /issue-auto, /issue-from-test, /issue-from-genai, /issue-create, /issue-preview
- Docs (5): /sync-docs, /sync-docs-api, /sync-docs-changelog, /sync-docs-organize, /sync-docs-auto
- Quality (3): /format, /security-scan, /full-check
- Workflow (4): /setup, /auto-implement, /uninstall, and more

**6 Skills:**
- python-standards: PEP 8, type hints, docstrings
- testing-guide: Three-layer testing (pytest + GenAI + meta-analysis)
- security-patterns: OWASP, secrets management
- documentation-guide: Docs sync automation
- research-patterns: Web research methodology
- engineering-standards: Code quality standards

**Result:** Focus on features, everything else is automatic.
